description.New field: Secondary victims indicates that the breach being coded is the first part of a supply chain breach.

definition.New field: The number of known secondary victims. Should always be a positive number if victim_id is filled in.  May not represent all victims if some are unknown.

Update.new: ISO4217 currency code. More Info

Update.old: The victim or a part thereof (such as an employee). More Info
Update.new: The victim or a part thereof (such as an employee). More Info. Unless it is an error or intentional breaking of rules (misuse), the actor MUST be acting maliciously.

Update.old: An entity with an organizational relationship to the victim, but not the victim. More Info
Update.new: An entity with an organizational relationship to the victim, but not the victim (such as a customer or supplier). More Info

Update.old: Capabilities and investments an attacker must aquire prior to the actions on target.  May be internal to the actors organization (vertically integrated org), or external (purchased in a criminal market).
Update.new: Capabilities and investments an attacker must acquire prior to the actions on target, (either by purchase or investment in creating).  May be internal to the actors organization (vertically integrated org), or external (purchased in a criminal market).
ISO4217 currency code. More Info
